mapper.select: SELECT ord.order_no, custmst.cust_nm AS customer_name, STUFF(( SELECT ', ' + itemmst.item_nm + ' (' + CAST(order_item.qty AS VARCHAR(10)) + '개)' FROM tb_order_item AS order_item JOIN tb_itemmst AS itemmst ON order_item.item_cd = itemmst.item_cd WHERE ord.order_no = order_item.order_no FOR XML PATH('')), 1, 2, '') AS items FROM tb_order AS ord JOIN tb_custmst AS custmst ON ord.cust_cd = custmst.cust_cd WHERE ord.order_status_chk IN (0, 2) -- 주문 상태가 0 또는 2인 경우에만 가져옴 and ord.order_delete_chk=0 GROUP BY ord.order_no, custmst.cust_nm

select ord.order_dt, cust.cust_nm, ord.order_status_chk, ord.order_end_dt
from tb_order as ord join tb_custmst as cust on ord.cust_cd=cust.cust_cd
where ord.ORDER_NO = #{order_no} and ord.order_delete_chk=0

SELECT ori.order_no, ori.item_cd, ori.qty, ori.qty - ISNULL(oi.qty, 0) AS remain_qty, i.item_nm, dbo.FN_CURRENT_STOCK(ori.item_cd) AS stock FROM TB_ORDER_ITEM AS ori JOIN TB_ITEMMST AS i ON ori.item_cd = i.item_cd JOIN TB_ORDER AS ord ON ori.ORDER_NO = ord.ORDER_NO LEFT JOIN ( SELECT oi.order_no, oi.item_cd, SUM(oi.qty) AS qty FROM TB_OUTITEM_ITEM AS oi JOIN TB_OUTITEM AS o ON oi.outitem_no = o.outitem_no WHERE o.outitem_delete_chk = 0 GROUP BY oi.order_no, oi.item_cd ) AS oi ON ori.order_no = oi.order_no AND ori.item_cd = oi.item_cd WHERE ord.ORDER_DELETE_CHK = 0 and ori.ORDER_NO = #{order_no}

SELECT CASE WHEN EXISTS ( SELECT A.item_cd FROM ( SELECT item_cd, SUM(qty) AS qty FROM TB_ORDER_ITEM AS ori JOIN tb_order AS ord ON ori.order_no = ord.order_no WHERE ori.ORDER_NO = #{order_no} AND ord.order_delete_chk = 0 GROUP BY item_cd ) AS A WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ( SELECT item_cd, SUM(qty) AS qty FROM TB_OUTITEM_ITEM AS outi JOIN tb_outitem AS ou ON outi.outitem_no = ou.outitem_no WHERE outi.order_no = #{order_no} AND ou.outitem_delete_chk = 0 GROUP BY item_cd ) AS B WHERE A.item_cd = B.item_cd AND A.qty = B.qty ) ) THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS result
SELECT count(*) FROM TB_OUTITEM_ITEM as oui join TB_ORDER as ord on ord.order_no = oui.ORDER_NO WHERE oui.order_no = #{order_no}
